image.description: A delicious lemon cupcake with lemon zest garnish and white frosting.

instructions: Pour the eggs and sugar into your bowl and blanch the eggs for a few minutes. Then add the oil and mix.
Add the flours, baking soda, and vinegar, then the lemon juice, then mix.
Oil the molds with a brush and pour the mixture.
Place your molds in the oven at 180°C for about forty minutes.

image.description: A delightful strawberry cupcake with white frosting and a fresh strawberry and blueberry on top.

instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C.
Mix  milk and vinegar in a container.
Place the dry ingredients except the raspberries and chocolate in a bowl and stir.
Then, add the liquids and mix to incorporate everything.Then add the raspberries and chocolate stir gently.
Fill your molds almost completely.
Bake for 20 minutes.

image.description: A scrumptious vanilla cupcake with fluffy whipped cream and fresh fruit on top.

instructions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.
Combine  milk and  vinegar in a bowl, stir and wait a few minutes.
In a large bowl, mix the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt.
Pour in the milk/vinegar mixture, oil and vanilla. Whisk until well combined.
Fill the liners and bake for 18-20 minutes.
Top with whipped cream and  fruits of your choice.

image.description: An irresistible red velvet cupcake with cream cheese frosting.

instructions: Pour the eggs and sugar into your bowl and blanch the eggs for a few minutes. Then add the oil and mix.
Add the flours, baking soda, and vinegar, then the lemon juice, then mix.
Oil the molds with a brush and pour the mixture.
Place your molds in the oven at 180°C for about forty minutes.

image.description: A delicious carrot cake cupcake with cream cheese frosting and nut sprinkles, so good, that it already has a bite taken out of it.

ingredients: 175 g Dairy-free margarine - I'd recommend Pure Sunflower as that's what I've tested in this recipe
instructions: Pre-heat your oven to 160ºC/140ºC fan.
Prep dark chocolate (75g).)
Put all of the ingredients into a large bowl and mix until smooth.
Divide the mixture between the 12 cupcake cases.
Put the tin into the oven and cook the cupcakes for 20-25 minutes.
Once cooked, remove the cupcakes from the oven and leave them to cool for a few minutes.

image.description: A tempting chocolate cupcake topped with creamy chocolate ganache.

image.description: A scrumptious s'mores cupcake with a graham cracker base, chocolate layer, gooey marshmallow topping, and a tempting missing bite, revealing the different textures.

image.description: A delightful pavlova cupcake, garnished with raspberries and luscious raspberry sauce drizzling down the sides, creating a visually enchanting treat.

image.description: A mouthwatering frappuccino cupcake, drizzled with chocolate sauce, and sprinkled with chocolate sprinkles, and a green straw sticking out on the side, promising a delightful and visually appealing treat.

image.description: A scrumptious cupcake filled with cannoli filling and chocolate sprinkles nestled within. The top is generously frosted with chocolate, creating a delightful and satisfying dessert.
